articles.content: Although they thrived in the 90s and 00s, girl groups have had less impact on western pop over the past decade. With the exception of Little Mix, who recently went on hiatus, the charts in the 2010s … [+4931 chars]

articles.title: Chicago jury convicts R. Kelly of child pornography charges - Daily Mail
articles.description: Kelly, 55, was found guilty on three counts of child pornography but was acquitted of a conspiracy to obstruct justice. He was convicted by a New York jury of sex trafficking in June.
